testsuite.name: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Git availability checks
testcase.name: should detect if git is available

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Git availability checks
testcase.name: should return false for non-git directory

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Git rename tracking
testcase.name: should track file rename via git

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Git rename tracking
testcase.name: should track file move to subdirectory

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Git rename tracking
testcase.name: should track complex rename and move

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Link fixing for renamed files
testcase.name: should contain proper link replacement logic

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Link fixing for renamed files
testcase.name: should preserve anchors when fixing links

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Link fixing for renamed files
testcase.name: should handle multiple occurrences in single file

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › External link handling
testcase.name: should not modify http links

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › External link handling
testcase.name: should not modify https links

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › External link handling
testcase.name: should not modify email links

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › External link handling
testcase.name: should not modify anchor-only links

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Validator integration scenarios
testcase.name: should detect broken links that need rename fixing

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Validator integration scenarios
testcase.name: should handle case-insensitive matching with renames

testcase.classname: Git Rename Detection - Link Validator Enhancement › Validator integration scenarios
testcase.name: should document git rename detection feature usage
